name: Public Value Added
description: How much value would a publication from the coordinator benefit the broader community?

values.name: Precedence
values.description: The publication would be the first publicly available, or be coincident with the first publicly available.

values.name: Ampliative
values.description: Amplifies and/or augments the existing public information about the vulnerability, for example, adds additional detail, addresses or corrects errors in other public information, draws further attention to the vulnerability, etc.

values.name: Limited
values.description: Minimal value added to the existing public information because existing information is already high quality and in multiple outlets.
